QuestData.Title: Seeds Away!
QuestData.Description:
I think we have a problem. Plucking the seed from this root must have shaken some burrowed gorm awake. This isn't good!
Grab on to me. I will fly us out of here, but we must stop the gorm before they overrun the local Vorkai defenses!
QuestData.LogDescription: Stop the gorm from overrunning the Gormhive Defense Wall and then pouring into the rest of Ardenweald!
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Meet back up with Pelagos at the Grove of Awakening.
